Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Oral - contraceptive use protected against ovarian cancer both for carriers of the BRCA1 mutation ( odds ratio , 0 . 5 ; 95 percent confidence interval , 0 . 3 to 0 . 9 ) and for carriers of the BRCA2 mutation ( odds ratio , 0 . 4 ; 95 percent confidence interval , 0 . 2 to 1 . 1 ) .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| ovarian cancer |
| BRCA1 mutation |
| BRCA2 mutation |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| ovarian cancer |
| (for carriers of the BRCA1 mutation) |
| (for carriers of the BRCA2 mutation) |

Note: The "odds ratio" and "95 percent confidence interval" are not diseases, but statistical measures.
